title: Chicken chasseur with creamy mash
description: Chicken and tarragon is a winning combination of flavours. Cook up dinner for four with chicken pieces in rich sauce served with creamy mash potatoes.
ingredients: salt and freshly ground black pepper
110g/4oz smoked streaky bacon, sliced into 1cm/½in pieces
1kg/2lb 4oz floury potatoes, peeled and cut into chunks
